program:
# Your program goes here
.begin
outsc #msg #endmsg
set #idx 1
null #name #endname

.loop
halt
inp
set #key r

~ *#key &nl
jmp #post_enter r

= *#idx 1
jmp #loop r
outsc #msg2 #endmsg2
outs #name #endname
out '! 1
halt
jmp #begin 1
.post_enter

~ *#key &del
jmp #post_del r

= *#idx 1
jmp #loop r
out &del 1
- *#idx 1
set #idx r
set *#idx 0
jmp #loop 1
.post_del

= *#idx 16
jmp #loop r
out *#key 1
set *#idx *#key
+ *#idx 1
set #idx r
jmp #loop 1
mmap:
# Allocated memory for your program goes here
.name
_15
:endname
.idx
_1
.key
_1
constant:
# Constant values for your program go here
.msg
&clr
'What is your name?
&nl
:endmsg

.msg2
&nl
'Hello, 
:endmsg2
